column5: Here is a link to some of my friend Chris' songs....  after 25 years or so of singing and writing he's on his way to making it.  He's heading to Nashville in February .... wish him luck!!!  Thanks for listening.  RFS   http://radio3.cbc.ca/
Crap  the link didn't work.... sorry about that...  http://radio3.cbc.ca/bands/Christopher-Leblanc   this should work
Guess there's no way to listen to HIS music. Hit the link and thought.. this sure ain't country playin.. lol
Off to the right hand side there are two song titles  "The Honor Song"  & " Cry"  click on the arrows
